outputs.crs_descr: Public sector policy and administrative management
outputs.output_descr: Strategic Flexible Funding Facility to provide short-term, high impact and quick  technical assistance to the Government in order to facilitate policy development and implementation in specified strategic areas

project_descr: The UNDP along with other donor partners seeks to support the Government of Jamaica in meeting its development goals by establishing a facility for responding to strategic short-term development needs with flexibility.
